= Most Recent/Recommended Version =


  * corset 1.03 ([https://googledrive.com/host/0B1FwZagazjpcc0JLZWllcFlwUXc/corset-1.03-linux64.tar.gz  linux64 binary])([https://googledrive.com/host/0B1FwZagazjpcc0JLZWllcFlwUXc/corset-1.03.tar.gz source]) - from 10th September 2014 (bug fix to allow compilation against samtools 1.0)

For those with the Homebrew package manager for Mac OSX, you can install corset 1.02 with "brew tap homebrew/science" then "brew install corset". Thanks to Aurelien Mazurie for adding corset!
